entities.description: The use of inhalants for kicks or to get high.
Specific types of inhalants such as air duster, amyl nitrite, etc.
Age when the respondent first used an inhalant for kicks or to get high.
Year when the respondent first used an inhalant for kicks or to get high.
Description of inhalant use in the current year.

relationships.description: Indicates whether the respondent used inhalants to get high.
Lists the specific types of inhalants that were used.
Defines the age at which inhalant use first occurred.
Defines the year in which inhalant use first occurred.
Refers to the inhalant use in the current year.
